medical_history.chief_complaint: 5 days of RUQ abdominal pain without relief.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 5 days ago, with pain worsening today compared to previous days. The pain was described as a 'poking' sensation, exacerbated by movement and after eating rice and beans. Denies nausea, vomiting, diarrhea, and fevers, but has experienced constipation and occasional palpitations.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, overweight, urinary frequency, abnormal EKG, hyperlipidemia, hyperglycemia, abnormal liver function tests, anemia, abdominal pain, depression, insomnia.
medical_history.family_history: Mother with type II diabetes, coronary artery disease, and hypertension. Father with type II diabetes and heart disease. Daughter with depression.
